description: Retrieves details about your account's limits and usage in an Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: AccountLimit
nested_items.description: Limits that are related to concurrency and code storage.

nested_items.name: TotalCodeSize
nested_items.description: The amount of storage space that you can use for all deployment packages and layer archives.

nested_items.name: CodeSizeUnzipped
nested_items.description: The maximum size of a function's deployment package and layers when they're extracted.

nested_items.name: CodeSizeZipped
nested_items.description: The maximum size of a deployment package when it's uploaded directly to Lambda. Use Amazon S3 for larger files.

nested_items.name: ConcurrentExecutions
nested_items.description: The maximum number of simultaneous function executions.

nested_items.name: UnreservedConcurrentExecutions
nested_items.description: The maximum number of simultaneous function executions, minus the capacity that's reserved for individual functions with  PutFunctionConcurrency.

nested_items.name: AccountUsage
nested_items.description: The number of functions and amount of storage in use.

nested_items.name: TotalCodeSize
nested_items.description: The amount of storage space, in bytes, that's being used by deployment packages and layer archives.
